 2022-01952022-03-03ISI,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Business Corporations Act
Canada Cooperatives Act
Canada Not-for-profit Corporations Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Administered by the Department of Industry
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS ADMINISTERED BY THE DEPARTMENT OF INDUSTRY in order to (1) address various corporate governance issues related to the election of directors and the retention and production of documents; and (2) make technical or non-material changes to the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0040 Publication Date: 2022-03-16
